You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE
Checkout

Manage settings for the user experience and performance of the Checkout page. The Checkout module's API name is co.

Address Based Requested Date
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.addrrq
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Set Up the Requested Delivery Date Picker on the Checkout Page
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Line-level independence (LLI) checkout only
Address Based Ship Options
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.addrso
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Specify Shipping Group Options for LLI Checkout
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Line-level independence (LLI) checkout only
Address Owned by User
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.uown
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Allow a Customer Service Representative to Log In to a Storefront on Behalf of a Buyer
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Standard checkout or line-level independence (LLI) checkout
Contact Info Source
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.usrsrc
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Specify the Source for Contact Information on the Checkout Page
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Standard checkout or line-level independence (LLI) checkout
Create Invoice
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.crinv
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Create an invoice record for every order placed by calling the ccrz.cc_hk_Invoice.order extension class method. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Standard checkout or line-level independence (LLI) checkout
Display Guest Confirmation Information
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.cnfdsplguestinfo
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show Order Confirmation Details and Send Order Emails
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13) or later
Standard checkout or line-level independence (LLI) checkout
New Order
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.neworder
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Configure Payment Options Available on the Checkout Page
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Standard checkout or line-level independence (LLI) checkout
Order Confirmation URL
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.cnfurl
Externally Safe?	
Usage	
Show Order Confirmation Details and Send Order Emails
https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.b2b_commerce_dev_guide.meta/b2b_commerce_dev_guide/ccrz_cc_hk_Order_placeTarget.htm

Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Standard checkout or line-level independence (LLI) checkout
Override Flow
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.overrideflow
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Replace the default flow of the standard Checkout page with a custom design. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Standard checkout only
Payment Types
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.pmts
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Set Up Payment Types for Storefront Purchases
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Standard checkout or line-level independence (LLI) checkout
Process Orders Asynchronously
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.asyncorder
Externally Safe?	
Usage	
Considerations for Asynchronous Processing for Carts and Orders
https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.noversion.b2b_commerce_dev_guide.meta/b2b_commerce_dev_guide/ccrz_ccLogicCartPlace.htm

Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13) or later
Standard checkout or line-level independence (LLI) checkout
Skip Price Adjustment
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.skpradj
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show Fees and Charges in the Order Review Section of the Checkout Page
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Standard checkout only
Use Default
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.usedef
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Use the default flow for the standard Checkout page. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE. To completely replace the checkout flow with a custom design, use FALSE.
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Standard checkout or line-level independence (LLI) checkout
Use Line Level Independence Checkout
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.uselli
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Enable Line-Level Independence (LLI) Checkout
Compatibility	
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Line-level independence (LLI) checkout only
Use Order Hook
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	co.usehkorder
Externally Safe?	
Usage	https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.noversion.b2b_commerce_dev_guide.meta/b2b_commerce_dev_guide/ccrz_ccLogicCartPlace.htm
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13) or later
SEE ALSO
Generate an Invoice for a Buyer's Order

Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Customizing Checkout Settings in Salesforce B2B Commerce
